DOC.brief_summary: Assess efficacy safety topical MOB015B , apply daily 48 week , adult fungal nail infection .
DOC.brief_title: An Open , Single-centre Pilot Study Efficacy Safety Topical MOB015B Treatment Distal Subungual Onychomycosis ( DSO )
